net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.dao

Class DAOHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.dao.DAOHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InitializingBean

    public abstract class DAOHelper
extends Object
implements InitializingBean
    Helper implementation for CRUD based DAOs.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (ken@i2rd.com)

      static class  DAOHelper.DAOEntityStateValidationException
      Exception generated when DAO validation for checking the contracted entity states is violated.

        Begin a transaction.
        Parameters:

        See Also:

      • commitTransaction

        protected void commitTransaction()
        Commit transaction. If the beginTransaction() has been called multiple times since the last rollback or commit, then this method will do nothing. The last commitTransaction() will commit the transaction.

      • getHibernateType

public Type getHibernateType(Class<?> type)

        Returns:

      • recoverableRollbackTransaction

        protected void recoverableRollbackTransaction()
        Rollback the transaction (and the cause is not a hibernate exception so its recoverable)
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not in a transaction.
        See Also:
        HibernateSessionHelper.recoverableRollbackTransaction()

      • rollbackTransaction

        protected void rollbackTransaction()
        Rollback the transaction.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not in a transaction.
        See Also:
        HibernateSessionHelper.rollbackTransaction()

      • setSessionHelper

        public void setSessionHelper(HibernateSessionHelper sessionHelper)
        Set the hibernate session helper.
        Parameters:

      • validatePersistentEntityState

        protected void validatePersistentEntityState(Serializable entity,
                                 String entityParamName)
                                      throws DAOHelper.DAOEntityStateValidationException
        Validate that the provided hibernate entity is persistent.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity.
        entityParamName - The name of the entity that will be used in exception message. Optional.
        Throws:
        DAOHelper.DAOEntityStateValidationException - If the entity is not persistent. This can include if the entity is null.
